Trader Vollodos:
Please collect the research ingredients from the monsters in the area. We need Putrefied Extract from the Corpse Devourer, Corpse Absorber, Corpse Shredder, Plagueworm, Contaminated Rottenroot, and Decayed Spore. We need Rotten Blood from the Swamp Stalker, Swamp Assassin, Swamp Watcher, Corpse Collector, Delegate of Blood, and Blood Aide. We need about 20 each to continue the research.
Do you think you can handle it?
